text: Anyone have successful examples of Svelte implementation in custom modules? Just curious; my enjoyment factor with Svelte continues to grow over React and I want to see if its practical to use in HubSpot.

I haven’t personally seen someone use svelte on HubSpot but that doesn’t mean it hasn’t happened. I too would be interested in hearing if anyone’s done it, what the experience was like, and what they’ve learned in doing it.

This doc may be helpful - even though we don’t specifically call out Svelte.
<https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/guides/js-frameworks>
